remarks: Two ways to say that the degree of ` F ` is strictly less than ` N ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jul-2014.)
statement:
dgreq0.1 $e |- N = ( deg ` F ) $.
dgreq0.2 $e |- A = ( coeff ` F ) $.
dgrlt $p |- ( ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ M e. NN0 ) -> ( ( F = 0p \/ N < M ) <-> ( N <_ M /\ ( A ` M ) = 0 ) ) ) $.
